name: Miami Nights 2: The city is yours
storyline:
Build a prestigious career and enter the envied circle of Miami’s most powerful. Your newfound celebrity status will make you encounter characters so crazy and unexpected they will seem drawn from a movie script. All non-playable characters have a human-like memory so don’t offend them or they might come and beat you up later in the game. Use your notoriety to flirt, kiss, seduce and more… But don’t forget to manage your relationships, especially with your ex(es), otherwise they will come and stalk you at your door.

A game map 3 times larger than the first Miami Nights and 30 new locations including Key Biscayne
Choose among four careers (detective, book publisher, jet-setter, cool hunter)
Meet emblematic characters inspired by your favorite movies
Play the game again with different career goals and neighborhoods for a new adventure!
The first NPCs with a human-like memory: deepen your relationship with an NPC every time you meet
Put your friends and family in the adventure thanks to the phone camera functions"
summary:
The game begins by creating an Avatar. At first, life in fame is just a dream. Waking up in reality, he is just one more, with a friend in prison that you must free and many adventures.

The player must choose his career between: detective, editor, high society character and coolhunter, fulfill his objectives in one way or another and thus achieve what he has always longed for.
